title: Safe Bet
description: This is one play no one saw coming...Sydney Walker’s new job is perfect.She loves the adorable kids she nannies. She loves living in this amazing mansion. She loves the kid’s mom, and she loves her NFL quarterback boss.But not the way the media says.Ugly rumors that she and her boss Drew Callahan are having a torrid affair are everywhere, destroying her reputation and threatening everything she loves. So Drew’s wife Fable comes up with the perfect idea. A fake relationship between Sydney and a hot team rookie? Yes, please.Wade Knox is forever indebted to Drew and Fable and readily agrees to the set up. Pretending to be in love with the sexy nanny for a week—how hard can it be? Turns out faking it was no safe bet after all. **This mash-up new adult romance features characters from both the One Week Girlfriend series and The Rules series!**
author: Monica  Murphy
